Package com.example.blackbox.profile

Class ProfileDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.blackbox.profile.ProfileDB
public class ProfileDB extends Object
The ProfileDB class is responsible for interacting with the Firebase Firestore database to perform operations related to user profiles.

    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    ProfileDB.OnProfileRetrievedListener
    Interface to define a callback for Profile retrieval.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfileDB

      public ProfileDB()
      Default constructor for the ProfileDB class. Initializes the Firebase Firestore instance and sets the collection reference to "profiles".

    • ProfileDB

      public ProfileDB(String collectionName)
      Constructor for the ProfileDB class with a custom collection name.
      Parameters:
      collectionName - The name of the Firestore collection for profiles.

  • Method Details

    • getProfileRef

      public com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference getProfileRef()
      Retrieves the Firestore collection reference for profiles.
      Returns:
      The CollectionReference for profiles.

    • addEditProfile

      public void addEditProfile(Profile profile)
      Adds or updates a user profile in the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      profile - The Profile object containing user information to be added or updated.

    • getProfileById

      public void getProfileById(String uid, ProfileDB.OnProfileRetrievedListener listener)
      Retrieves a user profile from the Firestore database by the user ID.
      Parameters:
      uid - The user ID for the profile to retrieve.
      listener - An OnProfileRetrievedListener to handle the retrieved profile.
